summary.summary: Experienced data scientist and analytics leader with a decade of hands-on experience in advanced data analytics, machine learning, and AI. Proven track record in developing and implementing LLM-based solutions, optimizing AI models, and leading high-performing teams. Seeking to leverage expertise in prompt engineering, NLP, and generative AI to drive innovation in AI-powered sales coaching and training solutions.

work_experience.role: Sr. Manager Analytics (AI and ML Focus)
description: Led global analytics team in implementing AI-driven solutions, improving delivery promise accuracy and boosting speed badging by 1500 bps, resulting in ~$5M annual revenue increase.
Designed and implemented A/B testing framework for measuring conversion impact of AI-generated delivery promises, guiding strategic initiatives and ROI estimation.
Developed causal inference models to quantify the impact of AI-optimized delivery speed on conversion rates, controlling for multiple factors and informing investment decisions.
nice_to_add: Experience with LLM-based solutions for customer-facing applications
Prompt engineering for optimizing AI model outputs in e-commerce context

description: Developed machine learning model to estimate delivery times, improving speed by 1.3 days and generating €10M in additional annual revenue through increased conversion rates.
Established KPIs and designed dashboards to evaluate AI model performance in the delivery network, presenting insights to executive leadership in weekly and monthly reviews.
Led AI-driven strategy for optimizing delivery promise speed during high-volume events, collaborating across departments to ensure alignment and buy-in.
nice_to_add: Implementation of NLP techniques for analyzing customer feedback on delivery experiences
Development of AI-powered chatbots for customer service inquiries related to deliveries

description: Created ML-based model improving delivery promise by 0.7 days without impacting reliability, driving >$100M in annual revenue through higher conversion rates.
Built and led a high-performing data science team of 3, focusing on developing impactful AI solutions for the organization, resulting in multiple awards and recognitions.
Developed data pipelines using SQL Server and Google BigQuery to integrate carrier, warehouse, and customer data, enabling comprehensive AI-driven analysis of the delivery network.
nice_to_add: Experience with generative AI models for creating personalized product recommendations
Implementation of reinforcement learning techniques to optimize delivery routes

special_achievements: Finalist of EY Case Competition Ukraine

certifications_trainings.name: Generative AI with Large Language Models
certifications_trainings.description: Comprehensive course on LLM fundamentals, optimization techniques, and practical applications.
certifications_trainings.key_technologies_concepts: Generative AI, LLMs, transformer architecture, RLHF, chain-of-thought prompting, model optimization

certifications_trainings.name: LLM Bootcamp
certifications_trainings.description: Intensive training on LLMs, RAG, and advanced NLP techniques for production environments.
certifications_trainings.key_technologies_concepts: LLMs, RAG, OpenAI API, HuggingFace Hub, vector databases, LangChain, evaluation techniques

project.name: RAG for Recipe Recommendation System
project.purpose: Developed an advanced RAG system for personalized recipe recommendations
project.key_technologies_concepts: RAG, FAISS, LanceDB, LLM-based relevance scoring, Gradio UI, Docker, LLM Factory

certifications_trainings.name: MLOps Bootcamp
certifications_trainings.description: Comprehensive training on MLOps practices and tools for production ML systems.
certifications_trainings.key_technologies_concepts: MLflow, workflow orchestration, model deployment, monitoring, testing, code quality

project.name: End to End ML Deployment Using AutoGluon and OpenFE
project.purpose: Implemented a full MLOps pipeline for automated model training and deployment
project.key_technologies_concepts: AutoML, feature engineering, cloud infrastructure, MLflow, Docker, Grafana

projects.name: YouTube Transcript Analyzer
projects.purpose: Developed an LLM-powered tool for analyzing YouTube video transcripts and generating Q&A content
projects.key_technologies_concepts: LLM integration, YouTube API, Instructor library, structured output generation, token estimation

projects.name: LLM Kaggle Winning Solution
projects.purpose: Created a high-performing LLM-based solution for a Kaggle competition
projects.key_technologies_concepts: Claude-3.5 Sonnet LLM, zero-shot chain of thought reasoning, LLM code generation, multithreading
